content.title: Add Android Frameworks
content.body:
1. In the search bar on top of the window, type android.app.job.
  2. Under Android API level 28 onwards, select the android.app.job framework.
  3. Similarly, search and select the following frameworks:
    • android.content
    • android.net
    • android.support.v8.renderscript
    • android.view
    • android.webkit
    • java.lang
    • java.util
  4. Click Add.
  5. Close the Native Function Interface:MyBarCodeScanner

All frameworks required to access the barcode scanner have been added.
